tidbits.title: Inca Heritage
tidbits.description: Peru is renowned for its rich Inca heritage, including the iconic Machu Picchu, ancient ruins, and the Inca Trail trek.

tidbits.title: Biodiversity
tidbits.description: The country boasts incredible biodiversity, from the Amazon rainforest to the Andes mountains, fostering unique ecosystems.

tidbits.title: Gastronomic Capital
tidbits.description: Peru is considered a gastronomic capital, offering diverse cuisine like ceviche and pisco sour, reflecting its culinary heritage.
